General.Name: Zhejiang Provincial New Energy Investment Group Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Zhejiang Provincial New Energy Investment Group Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, construction, operation, and management of renewable energy projects in China. It is involved in hydropower, photovoltaic power, and wind power generation, as well as hydrogen energy equipment projects. The company engages in sale of electricity; and investment management business. It has a total installed capacity of approximately 3,794,100 kilowatts. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Provincial New Energy Investment Group Co., Ltd.operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Provincial Energy Group Company Ltd.
General.Address: No. 8 Fengqi East Road, Hangzhou, China, 310020
